card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Pakurio
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may look at your opponent's hand and add a card from it to their shields face down.

card.name: Zerokage, Lightfang Lord
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Ninja Strike ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Ryusei Kaiser, the Eternal
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's creatures are put tapped. ■ When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of an opponent's creature, you may put it instead.

card.name: Dondon Vacuuming Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Onimaru "Head", Victory Rush
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ Gachinko Judge 2

card.name: Forever Princess, Eternal Ruler
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone For No Cost ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, shuffle this card and your graveyard into your deck instead.

card.name: Lifeplan Charger
card.text: ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may take a creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ Charger

card.name: Mitsurugi Boost, Matchless Dragon Demon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put this creature into your mana zone. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

card.name: Kaiser "Baki", Zenith of "Certain Victory"
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, count the number of your opponent's shields and play that number of Gachinko Judge games. For each time you win Gachinko Judge in this way, put a Hunter from your graveyard, mana zone or hand into the battle zone. Gachinko Judge ■ Eternal Omega

card.name: Meteorite Ryusei the Flash
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Faerie Shower
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your mana zone.
